name: Gallop for Gold Slots
description:
Beat the bookie and share the fun in
Gallop for Gold Slots... with the first ever Nudge Jackpot and 6 unique bookie bonuses in the feature bonus round - this really is the mane event!

Can your horse win all 48 trophies and become super-champion? Try it now and see!

During normal play the highly fashionable hostess acts as a wildcard and substitutes for all symbols except scattered horses.

The Colt Cash Feature.

3, 4 or 5 scattered horses during normal play will award you free games and the Colt Cash Feature - where all pays are doubled.

At the end of the free games the Bookie's Bonus round plays. The first and last reel spin and a special bonus prize will appear!

The Daily Double Jackpot.

A part of all wins during the free games are added to the Daily Double Jackpot. The longer it takes you to win the jackpot, the higher it can grow - up to 99 thousand virtual dollars. The jackpot can only be won during the free games.

Horse racing feature

You have your very own horse to upgrade and race to win the 48 available trophies!

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
